mapper.select: SELECT t.tester_num, title, thumbnail, content, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.num FROM TestBoard t INNER JOIN Project p ON t.num = p.num WHERE t.num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPONSOR (memberIdx, num, request_date, block) VALUES ( #{memberIdx}, (SELECT tester_num FROM TestBoard WHERE num = #{num}), SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Sponsor WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND num = (SELECT tester_num FROM TestBoard WHERE num = #{num})
